nodes.text: Jesha Narlock was a Mon Calamari in Republic service during the Third Galactic War. Jesha Narlock's father Dol Narlock served as an inspiration for Jesha and was the reason why Jesha decided to join the service.

Jesha Narlock first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught. In the Republic storyline, Jesha sent a message to the Alliance Commander to thank the Commander for saving Jesha's father after the events on Mek-Sha.
